RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 17, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VICTOR STORY midpack, swung outside, surged late, won driving. BELLA BASORA settled three wide,rallied for place. SMOOKIE saved ground, late effort. DEVILISH MAGIC set pace, tired. SUGAR BRITCHES no threat. NURSE KATIE brief speed, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Victor Story
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack, swung outside, surged late, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 17 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE REIGN SONG saved ground, rallied inside, won driving. ANNA VOLANTE dueled outside, held gamely. POLITICAL ASTRAY good late rally three wide. BRODY'S JESSICA needed more late. MASKED HEROINE good late energy. IRON BERTIE near pace, tired. TORIANNE no factor. TEXAS DANA dueled, gave way. PEARLINTHEROUGH outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 11300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 17, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Not Considered In ELIGIBILITY).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNTOUCHED ELEGANCE set pace, won driving. GIRO KATE inside early, swung out top of stretch, rallied. DEL MAR FLASH chased, bested others. DONYA'S MAGIC pressed pace, tired. BRYCE'S PHILLY outrun. STRADARI three wide, no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Donya's Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Staley Terry and Lugovich Charles F

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIZMO'S MISSION took command early, won easily. CIRCLE INDY rallied inside, second best. JACK D up close, lost place late. SPY TOWN trailed, good late energy while four wide. CAB BEEF no threat. GALLAZO showed little. MY SONG BABY chased, gave way. CALIFORNIA EMERALD outrun. PER RULING #260 FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, GIZMO'S MISSION WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM 1st TO UNPLACED DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Spy Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, good late energy four wide

ENTRY.NAME: Jack D
ENTRY.OWNER: Bland Gregory R and Agler Trey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 17 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowance s)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIGHTNIN RUNNER set pace inside, won driving. MISS SHADY hopped star, rallied. VINEGAR VEGGIES pressed pace, needed more late. IN TO THE NIGHT late bid inside. I'VE BEEN THINKIN pressed pace, tired. FOREST ACCLAMATION no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 17 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered I n Estimating Allowances) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WELL CONNECTED dueled inside, drew clear, won easily. FRONTLINER rallied, bore in bumping rival, dq'd and placed fourth. SILENT TIGER dueled between horses, held gamely. PALACE PRINCE bumped stretch. BOLD ADVENTURE late bid. BROTHER SKYE four wide,bumped stretch,weakened. JOSHY JAK dueled three wide, tired. CATES SWOOSH brief speed. After a stewards inquiry and a riders objection, Frontliner was disqualified from second and placed fourth.

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 17 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Cons idered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH DOLLAR DATE dueled throughout, won driving. FIRST IMPRESSION dueled from inside, battled gamely, held second. HOV LANE chased leaders, needed more late. CHICA CHULA mild bid. REACHING STRIDE spotty effort. CARLY'S FLIGHT outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 17, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEAM HOT LINE took command early, dominated the running. YESTERDAYSPLAN far back early, rallied for place. MOTHERWELL bested others. CHECK SIX mild bid. ABIGAIL G bid, weakened. ESTA CALIENTE broke poorly. SUNDRENCHED up close, gave way. DIXIE'S DANCE tired. KIKI'S LULU ROSE outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Yesterdaysplan
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back early, rallied for place

ENTRY.NAME: Team Hot Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command early, dominated the running

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Desmond Ryan, Tony Dardis, Ken Donworth& Ben McElroy
